text:
It was a sleepless night on a planet he was still unused to.
After tossing and turning several times,
Canes woke up.

He quietly got up and left the bedroom.
So as not to wake his sibling,
who was sound asleep next to him.

He put his hand on the wall of the "newly built" house,
and slowly proceeded down the hallway
towards the kitchen to get water.

He glanced through the open sliding door.
His parents, who were "supposed to be" sleeping there, were gone,
but there were no lights on anywhere in the house.

Feeling a slight unease, he stepped down into the earthen floor,
and a faint voice reached Canes' ears.
From beyond a nearby window-

Tracking down the source of the voice, he moved closer to the wall.
Just as he expected, this time,
he could clearly hear his parents' voices.

name: Father
text:
But still, I can't believe it.
That bundle of energy, that kid,
won't even live half as long as us.

name: Father
text:
Don't you think the doctor is cruel?
He didn't have to say it so bluntly,
about something unseen like lifespan...

name: Mother
text:
Stop complaining.
Sterio himself is much
more in pain than us.

He was too surprised to even speak.
Canes remained where he was, listening
to his parents' conversation through the wall.

name: Mother
text:
I knew his species had
a vastly different growth rate than ours,
but it wasn't just that.

name: Mother
text:
He was abandoned when he was a baby,
perhaps because they thought he couldn't survive
in his homeland...

name: Father
text:
I don't know. We don't even know
the cultural level of his species,
we've never even met them.

name: Father
text:
...No, none of that matters.
No matter his origin, Sterio
is our son the moment we picked him up.

name: Father
text:
It has to be nothing but a chance encounter.
Besides, our family business
is one where we could die any day from accidents or disasters.

name: Mother
text:
That's true...
It's still the same, we'll live
each day to the fullest.

name: Mother
text:
It's been a while since we told Sterio himself,
but he's finally calmed down.
We have to keep it together.

name: Father
text:
...So, when are you going to tell Canes?
You can't really keep it
a secret from him, can you?

name: Mother
text:
But it's still too cruel to tell him.
At least until Sterio can fully accept
it himself-

Hearing his name in the conversation,
Canes immediately pulls away from the wall
and rushes back to his bedroom.

As if escaping from the reality
that he had heard what he shouldn't,
and learned what he didn't want to accept.

Unnoticed by anyone in his family,
Canes slips into his futon
and embraces the heavy truth.

name: Canes
text:
That's right, that's when I decided.
The world I can reach with my own two hands,
it's truly tiny, but-

name: Canes
text:
At least within that world,
I'll make sure my sibling
is always happy.

name: Canes
text:
It's a bit late, but thanks to everyone, I remembered.
I'll talk it over with Sterio properly.
About how we want to live...

name: Canes
text:
And why-
Why now?

In front of an uncontrollable threat
that suddenly appeared from the sea,
Canes mutters blankly.

For the boy, monster, like heroes,
were only entities
on the other side of the screen.

Now, he would actually experience
their unknown nature and danger
at Hero Festa.

He has to run quickly,
or he might not see his sibling again
without getting to tell him anything.

Precisely because he understands this critical situation,
the continuously blaring siren fuels his fear,
pinning Canes' feet to the ground.

name: Genji
text:
-Sorry,
I'm going first.

Genji tells his companions a word,
then immediately embraces Canes' body
and moves away from the coast.

name: Canes
text: Genji-san-

name: Genji
text:
Don't talk, catch your breath now.
Once I take you to your "puppy",
I'll head off for another rescue.

The coast recedes rapidly.
monster appear one after another,
reflected in Canes' eyes.

He follows the voice in his ear,
breathes deeply many times,
and somehow calms his mind.

Meanwhile, Sterio and the others also noticed the anomaly,
and were rushing towards the coast.
Soon after, the group reunites.

note: I think Gen-jiji was a wordplay on Genji-oji(san), basically Uncle Genji...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Did you bring Canes?
Thanks~ Gen-jiji!
You're a very good person!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Genji
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Well, call me whatever you want.
Goro, Pubraseer, let's go.
I'll create a "foothold."

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Did you bring Canes?
Thanks~ Gen-jiji!
You're a very good person!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Genji
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Well, call me whatever you want.
Goro, Pubraseer, let's go.
I'll create a "foothold."

dialogue_after_selection.name: Genji
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No need to thank me, it's my job.
Goro, Pubraseer, let's go.
I'll create a "foothold."

text:
Genji entrusts the boy to Sterio,
then turns on his heel and heads back towards the sea.
This time, "running up into the empty sky".

name: Goro
text:
Hey, can you hear me? That octopus guy
destroyed the path to the sea area.
We're going to rescue them, hurry and transform!

Communicating through the Labor's Site comms unit,
Goro and Pubraseer
transform into their usual hero suits.

Then, they step onto the shining path
that Genji had created
after running up just now.

name: Goro
text:
This "foothold" is certainly convenient, but
I wish there was something to do about
seeing through it... Well, anyway.

name: Pubraseer
text:
[Player], Rokusei.
We're heading to rescue the people
trapped in the divided area.

name: Goro
text:
We'll be right back,
please take care of Canes and Sterio.
Well then, we're off!

After seeing off the Labor's Site heroes,
[Player] also begins to move
to respond to the emergency.

name: Sterio
text:
Please, [Player].
Let me transform into a hero too!
I want to save "everyone at the venue"!

After transforming Rokusei again,
Sterio earnestly asks [Player]
with a serious expression.

There was no mention of his sibling's name;
he insisted that he wanted to participate
in the rescue efforts purely as a hero.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Sterio-kun... I understand how you feel, but
it's better to stay with Canes-kun now.
Let's take him to a safe place.

name: Sterio
text:
If monsters eat people,
someone's precious person will disappear, right?
I don't want that to happen, no way!

name: Sterio
text:
I don't want others to experience
my unpleasant and sad things,
even if they're complete strangers, it's the same!

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
It's certainly reassuring to have your strength.
But, you two have things
you need to talk about, don't you?

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Leave civilian rescue and monster
extermination to other heroes-
You two, evacuate with me.

Rokusei, who usually lightens the mood with his playful attitude,
this time advises them in a serious tone.

Seeing this, Canes and Sterio
realize how critical
the current situation is.

name: Genji
text:
The one speaking, and the one listening...
That's something you can only do
while you're both alive, you know.

name: Pubraseer
text:
This world is always
sudden and unreasonable, and
you never know when farewells will come.

The heroes' words he had just heard,
and their sad expressions,
resurface in his mind.

Their terrifying experiences.
The same thing might happen
to them.

Touching his sibling's slightly trembling arm,
Canes looks directly into Rokusei's eyes.

name: Canes
text:
-Sorry, Rokusei-san.
Even so, I don't think
we should be the only ones saved.

name: Canes
text:
As Sterio said, if someone
might become a monster's victim,
I want to help them if possible...

name: Canes
text:
Please, [Player]-san,
Rokusei-san... allow my sibling
to participate as a hero.

name: Canes
text:
Sterio's Parallel Weapon,
I think it doesn't just create wind
but also has the power to attract things.

name: Canes
text:
If that's the case, for example, he should be able to
gather monster in an easy-to-defeat spot, or keep them
away from evacuating people-

name: Canes
text:
...I don't know that much about heroes' abilities.
But, in the previous battle with the pirates,
I was watching Sterio's movements the whole time.

Canes seems to have inferred Sterio's abilities as a hero
from his movements at that time.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Wait, Canes-kun.
Even if Sterio-kun's Parallel Weapon
has such power-

Rokusei tries to stop Canes, thinking that he either
doesn't yet understand the danger of confronting monster,
or that it's recklessness born of youth.

However, he simultaneously feels a sense of incongruity.
The boy in front of him is not the type to speak
out of mere bravado or whim.

Judging by their expressions,
the colors of anxiety and fear haven't disappeared.
But even stronger than that-

He found the passion that countless heroes hold in their hearts,
the strong light of resolve, deep within the boys' eyes.

name: Canes
text:
At the very least, Sterio, who can transform,
I believe he won't be a hindrance to you, Rokusei-san.

name: Canes
text:
If my presence prevents everyone from fighting,
I'll run to the evacuation area alone.
I've already memorized the entire map.

Canes, to Rokusei, who is speechless, repeatedly
changes his expressions and passionately
begs for his sibling to be allowed to fight as a hero.

Rokusei realizes that his assessment
was wrong. To put it badly,
he had underestimated Canes and Sterio.

He thought that boys who only admired heroes
probably wouldn't have the courage to face
a life-or-death battle yet-

However, even if one had just awakened,
and the other couldn't transform.

The boys' hearts already held
the principles of the heroes they had met
so far.
The trigger for that was-

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text: -Is it "my" fault?

In his interactions with the boys,
a change occurred in Rokusei's heart.

The events at Hero Festa
overlapped with his experience of saving his hometown,
allowing his true face to peek through the gaps in his mask.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Of course I want to protect everyone at the venue.
Even though I'm usually in the shadows,
I'm still a hero at heart.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
That's why I only wanted to make you realize
the seriousness of the situation
and urge you to protect yourselves.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
But who would have thought that
it would become a trigger
to make them resolve to fight...?

name: Sterio
text:
......
Rokusei, do you
say "ore" at home?

note:
Normally he would refer to himself as 私 (watashi),
but in that moment just now he refered to himself as おれ (ore),
both mean "I", but the second one is much more grand

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Nyaa-! It's nothing!!
My character just broke a little,
so please don't mind it!!!

Having his true feelings revealed,
which he let slip due to inner turmoil,
Rokusei hurriedly tries to cover it up.

options.text: It's a rare sight of this old man...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei (Rookies)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, [Player]!
You're supposed to turn a blind eye to private things like that!?
Canes bows his head to Rokusei, who is doing his best to joke around.

name: Canes
text:
Because Rokusei-san and [Player]-san
introduced everyone, we were able to
learn about heroes.

name: Canes
text:
It's not just the glamorous side we see on broadcasts,
but that everyone has their own precious feelings
and the way they confront monsters-

name: Canes
text:
-If you say it's "my fault"
after giving us the opportunity to know that,
it makes me sad.

name: Sterio
text:
Canes is right.
I too am grateful to Rokusei
and [Player]!

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Canes-kun, Sterio-kun...
…………….

options.text: Well then, shall we save them both?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei (Rookies)
dialogue_after_selection.text: There you go again, trying to see through this old man's feelings and goading me on!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei (Rookies)
dialogue_after_selection.text: There you go again, trying to see through this old man's feelings and goading me on!

options.text: I want you two to escape, but...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei (Rookies)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's right, I feel the same way.
But at this stage, I can't hesitate anymore.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
...Alright, I'll brace myself too.
However, since I'm indulging your selfishness,
I'll do things my way too.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Canes-kun, Sterio-kun.
Let me reiterate, you are
also citizens I must protect.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
But this is an emergency. You two,
I'll trust that you can move better than
ordinary people to some extent, and we'll form a plan.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
I'll take all the scolding from the higher-ups
later, so let's team up, rookies!

name: Canes & Sterio
text: -Yes, sir!

Chapter 6:
Indomitable Spirit

[Player] and the others, led by Rokusei,
return to the beach area
of Hero Festa once again.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Alright? Our role is to
attract that big monster until
the heroes' reinforcements arrive.

A report on the current situation
is flowing in from the Hero Festa management office
via comms device.

It was stated that it would take time
to complete the evacuation of visitors and suppress
the monsters in each area.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
So we absolutely have to
keep that huge monster in the sea
pinned down here.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Even if we can't defeat it,
if we can keep it away from the heroes
during rescue operations, there's a chance to win.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Sterio-kun, I'm entrusting you with
the escort of Canes-kun and [Player]-kun.
I'll go out onto the sea now.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei (Rookies)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'll be the only one approaching the monster.
Unfortunately, I can't do any "major tricks" in Orient City.

options.text: Are you going to fight while swimming?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei (Rookies)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I wouldn't be that reckless, you know!?
But... I do have something I want to try with the power you observed.

options.text: Understood, leave the observation to me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei (Rookies)
dialogue_after_selection.text: That reply, it sounds like you have absolute trust in me, [Player]!

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
[Player], can you
sense the monster's presence
while observing us?

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Only around Sterio-kun.
Please inform everyone
if you can locate them, as much as possible.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
You'll be operating Sterio-kun, Canes-kun.
You've already experienced a hunting ground, haven't you?

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
You can't send ViewPower or
observe heroes like an Operator does,
but you should be able to advise on battle tactics.

Rokusei, having reported on the plan,
hands a spare comms device to Sterio.

name: Canes
text:
-Yes!
I'm counting on you!

name: Sterio
text:
I'll be relying on you too!
My arms are eager~!

With [Player]'s approval,
Sterio is once again enveloped in light
and dons his hero suit.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Alright, operation begins!
First, let's take care of those annoying
octopus legs.

Rokusei runs towards the open sea.
His body doesn't sink into the water;
he glides across the surface.

Part of his Parallel Weapon
transforms into a small flyboard,
spewing water and generating propulsion.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Whew~ this is exhilarating!
If nothing else was happening, I'd want to play like this,
but that's not an option now.

He slices through the monster's tentacles,
which are still there after he shattered the connection path
to the sea area, with a single swing of his blade.

name: Octopus Monster
text: -Gyaoooohhh!!

The monster, realizing that part of its body
has been destroyed, moves its remaining
tentacles and pursues Rokusei.

name: Canes
text:
Amazing, Rokusei-san!
I wonder if he's really a rookie,
but now's not the time to think about that-

name: Canes
text:
Sterio, let's do this too.
While defeating those smaller ones,
get as close to the sea as possible!

name: Sterio
text: Awooo~!

Faster than the monster can react,
Sterio rushes across the sandy beach
and swings his Parallel Weapon.

He punches, slams,
and crushes monster one after another
with attacks unleashed from his giant body.

[Player] follows him, observing the heroes,
while Canes advances,
guarding their rear.

options.text: Are you going to support Rokusei-san?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes, I'm aiming for that eventually.
But for now, dealing with the ones on land is the priority-

options.text: Should we look for a hiding place...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text: As long as we don't know how monster search for prey, by sight or sound, hiding doesn't guarantee safety.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text: In that case, it's better to be in an open area where their location is clear, so we can move easily-

name: Canes
text:
Sterio! Create wind on land,
like the tornado you used
against the pirates the other day!

name: Sterio
text: Okay, understood~!

Sterio takes a deep breath and
blows the horn with all his might,
and a sudden gust of wind immediately rises in front.

A pillar of wind rises, carrying sand.
The surrounding monster are sucked in,
colliding violently with each other and shattering.

The scene of that battle is also
seen by Rokusei out at sea.
His casual remark indicates, for now, relief.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
You're good, Sterio-kun!
But you can't outdone this old man!

Water erupts from his feet, and he soars through the sky.
In an instant, multiple tentacles
pierce the space where Rokusei was a moment ago.

He waits until they are fully extended,
then swings down the blade in his hand,
cutting them all off at once.

Rokusei couldn't confirm whether the large monster's
main body was damaged, but-

At least his speed of destroying the severed parts
and newly appearing tentacles
surpassed their rate of appearance.

As he continues to fight, Rokusei
laughs self-deprecatingly,
thinking how strange things have become.

name: Rokusei (Rookie)
text:
Even this time, I intended to leave the main stage
to the others and remain unseen
from the sidelines.

name: Rokusei (Rookie)
text:
I thought my detached self could do that,
but I never thought
such words would come out of me.

name: Rokusei (Rookie)
text:
To say I want to protect citizens
in a city that isn't my hometown...
This is just like being a "real hero".

As he told [Player] himself,
Tsuneaki as a boy
lived confined in a small world.

He had no special feelings for his family,
and had never felt any bonds
as spoken of in the world.

Even now that he has grown up, that hasn't changed,
and Tsuneaki analyzes himself as lacking humanity.

That's why he has been involved with various people
by imitating his mentor's behavior...
-Until just now, he believed that.

name: Rokusei
text:
No, it wasn't missing.
I had kept it locked away in my heart
and never tried to look at it.

name: Rokusei
text:
I thought that having humanity would only be
a weakness for me, who walks in the shadows.

name: Rokusei
text:
But the heroes I interacted with, [Player]-
opened the door and showed me it was there.

name: Gammei
text:
This is UEHA, evacuation of general citizens
in the assigned area complete!
Now all that's left is to capture the monster!

name: Kouki
text:
NeoTalents will now
guard the evacuation shelters.
Please leave the care of the citizens to us!

The voices of his companions he had just imagined
are now heard through the communication device.

name: Rokusei
text:
I'll admit it, Tsuneaki.
I have a normal heart.
And I'm envious of those boys.

name: Rokusei
text:
The sight of those siblings
talking casually about their family
and looking happy together.

name: Rokusei
text:
I can't help but envy
what I discarded for my dream,
what I couldn't get when I was a child.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
That's why I'll support them.
In the form of Rokusei, who suits the
sunlight so well, as observed by [Player].

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
I'll turn what I don't want to lose, my weakness, into strength.
Into the hidden power to never lose anything, no matter what!

The unevaded wounds increase.
His breathing becomes slightly labored.
Still, he doesn't stop his attacks.

Rokusei smiles proudly and
continues to divert the large monster.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Labor's Site, we arrived at the sea area.
Rescue operation for stranded citizens are underway.
No problems here, but still, in the sea-

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
-The big one in the sea is being
dealt with by me and my companions.
Don't worry, just prioritize rescue!

name: Canes
text:
You're pushing too far forward!
Fall back and create some distance, Sterio!

The amage from monsters gradually
accumulates on Sterio's body.

The effects caused by the horn
play a role in advancing the battle favorably,
but they have almost no attacking power themselves-

To repel monsters,
one must confront them at close range
with a Parallel Weapon.

name: Monsters
text:
Guoooooh,
Gyaoooooh!

name: Sterio
text:
Grrr!
Haa, haa-

name: Canes
text:
Are you okay? That last one
hit you with a lot of force,
didn't it...?

name: Sterio
text:
I'm fine, fine.
I can still do this!

He receives a blow from a monster as the wind obstruction fails,
but Sterio endures with his natural stamina.

The battle is by no means at a disadvantage,
but seeing his sibling getting hurt right in front of him
disturbs Canes' heart.

options.text: Come on, focus on the battle.

text:
Saying that, [Player] continues
to observe the heroes
with a resolute demeanor.

-At least, that's how it seemed to the boy he spoke to.
So much so that he once again realized
the clear difference in their experience.

name: Canes
text:
[Player]-san...!
So this is what operators always
feel like on the field.

name: Canes
text:
Even if a hero gets hurt, you can only watch,
and no matter how painful the situation,
you're not allowed to turn away-

options.text: Because that's the path I chose.
That's right, who else would observe everyone?

text:
Hearing words that could be either a monologue or a question,
[Player] speaks
their honest feelings.

options.text: I decided to believe in heroes.
I'm already used to painful things.
That's why I stand on the front lines like this.
I believe we'll definitely win in the end.
I want to remember everyone's achievements.

name: Canes
text: [Player]-san...

Canes is overwhelmed, witnessing
the Observer's resolve to face a life-or-death battle
with heroes.

The sound of the horn echoes nearby.
Sterio, who rushed to [Player]'s side,
creates a vortex of wind in front.

He draws the monster attacking
from all directions to one spot,
and hinders their movement.

name: Canes
text:
Damn it...!
Sorry for having to make you suffer, Sterio.
If only I could instruct better-

name: Sterio
text:
I'm fine, I'm sturdy!
It feels great to be able to rampage
this much~!

Without any hint of concern or bravado,
Sterio replies with a lively demeanor.

name: Sterio
text:
Canes, do you remember?
We've been in a pinch
like this before.

name: Sterio
text:
At that time, there were no monsters
nor battles like this, but the situation where we
thought it was over was the same.

The repeated sound of the horn
makes the wind's force even stronger.
Canes feels a sense of nostalgia in that sound.

name: Sterio
text:
When we first helped with hunting,
we were so tense
that we messed up right away.

name: Sterio
text:
We were so desperate to chase the prey, we got separated from everyone,
and before we knew it, we didn't know where we were,
and then it started raining heavily...

name: Sterio
text:
In the cave we fled to, I-
I thought I would never see
Papa and Mama again.

name: Sterio
text:
But, at that time, Canes,
you kept telling me it would be okay,
and you thought of many ways to save us.

name: Sterio
text:
I think then and now are the same.
So I'm not scared at all, and because you're here,
I can do my best no matter what!

As the wind dies down,
Sterio once again leaps out like a bullet
and knocks down the monster.

name: Canes
text:
...It's the opposite, Sterio.
I believed that because you were there,
I could somehow get through it, even if we were lost.

name: Canes
text:
It's the same now. Because you keep
playing that horn, I can stand here.

name: Canes
text:
You always praise me, but
I've never accomplished anything
on my own until now.

name: Canes
text:
I was always being helped
by Father, Mother,
everyone around me, and you, Sterio...

name: Canes
text:
I thought that someday, to become a full-fledged adult,
I had to accomplish at least one thing by myself.

name: Canes
text:
But-
Even adults help each other, don't they?
It's embarrassing that I didn't realize such a thing.

name: Canes
text:
Yes, it's embarrassing and pathetic, but...
I won't think of myself as a useless
person who can't do anything anymore.

name: Canes
text:
My good points are what you, since long ago,
have continued to teach me,
even to an embarrassing degree, so I'll believe in that.

Canes, looking at Sterio's back
as he confronts the swarming monster,
shouts his feelings.

name: Canes
text:
Still, I can't help but feel frustrated.
Even now, I can only give instructions from behind,
and I can't help you when you're getting hurt-

name: Canes
text:
I actually want to stand beside you!
I want to become the strongest, with the
best hunting dog, as his best sibling!

By voicing his heartfelt wish,
the image he has in mind
becomes clearer.

Standing side by side, leading hunters on Muirauka I,
and sometimes defeating monsters in unfamiliar lands-

That image of the future
flickers beyond a flash of light.

name: Canes
text:
I will never allow an unreasonable farewell!
I want to become a strong hero
who fears nothing, not even monsters!

A dazzling light covers [Player]'s eyes.
It is the glimmer of hope they have seen countless times.

Yet, it is a unique brilliance.
When the heroes' heartfelt cries
echo beyond the sky, it appears.

name: Canes
text:
What is this light?
Could it be- [Player]-san!!

name: Mobile Device
text:
New path detected.
Target: Canes
Strength: Very Strong

name: Mobile Device
text:
Connect path?
Tap "OK" to start operation.

The shining light of possibility from a parallel world
becomes a dazzling veil of light
and envelops Canes' entire body.

Soon after, the white light melts into him and disappears,
revealing the attire of a new hero.

name: Sterio
text:
Canes...?
Whoa~ you did it!
You transformed~!!

Sterio rejoices as if it were his own success,
seeing Canes transformed into a hero.

name: Monsters
text: Gyaoooooh!

A monster attacks the defenseless Sterio.
However-

name: Canes
text:
Don't you dare
lay a hand on my sibling!

-Canes' controlled giant fist
blocks it, and with a crimson bullet,
shatters the monster's core.

Two pairs of mechanical arms,
looking like both shields and fists,
floated around, protecting Sterio.

name: Canes
text:
......
I really transformed
into a hero, didn't I?

name: Canes
text:
I thought I had no aptitude,
that it was an impossible dream-

Thinking that, Canes remembers the words of the heroes
he heard in the past few days.

name: Mokdai
text:
When a dream is big,
doesn't the feeling that it's impossible
also grow bigger?

name: Mokdai
text:
Still, not giving up
takes a lot of courage, but
only you can do it for yourself.

name: Marfik
text:
You two, do what you want to do,
and choose any path
without leaving any regrets.

name: Canes
text:
-I see, everyone
made my dream come true.

name: Canes
text:
The dream I had almost given up on,
but still couldn't discard,
is because everyone taught me.

name: Canes
text:
[Player]-san...
Thank you.

name: Canes
text:
I'm a guy who's always being helped,
but I'll help everyone even more-
with this power you observed!

name: Sterio
text:
Canes... I'm happy.
Your dream came true, now
we can fight together forever!

name: Canes
text:
Yeah... sorry for worrying you.
I'm happy too, Sterio.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Heyyyyy, you two!
[Player]-kun too,
you haven't forgotten about me, have you!?

Rokusei shouts through the device.
His words sounded critical,
but his voice was very kind.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
I need your help right away,
because I'm starting to have a
tough time fighting alone.

name: Canes
text:
Rokusei-san!?
Sorry, I'll support you right away!
Oh, but how do I get to the sea-

Neither Canes' nor Sterio's
Parallel Weapons were suited
for combat on water.

At that moment, something like a spear
is thrown into the sea, and from it,
a metallic floor expands.

Looking towards where it was thrown,
there was one figure floating in the air-

name: Genji
text:
You idiots!!
What are you doing
instead of evacuating-!?

Noticing the unfamiliar figure,
Genji jumps down in front of [Player]
and glares at everyone.

He intended to scold the reckless youths
and yell at the man on the sea
who had put them in danger, but-

name: Genji
text:
...You, you're that kid.
You've gotten quite a
reliable face, haven't you?

name: Genji
text:
You're carrying a formidable weapon,
and with that "puppy" of yours,
your appearance isn't bad.

name: Genji
text:
...Well, I somewhat knew, but
you "too" are the type to observe
from the front lines, [Player].

Genji looks each person who is about to fight
in the eye to confirm their resolve,
then sighs softly and readies his weapon.

name: Genji
text:
...So you've already made up your mind.
Then this old man will just move his hands in silence.
From the start, to exterminate monsters is my role.

name: Genji
text:
Leave the ones on land to me.
You guys go assist Rokusei (that idiot).
I've created a foothold, so you can run there, right?

name: Canes
text:
Genji-san... Yes!
Thank you very much!
Alright, let's go, Sterio!

name: Sterio
text:
Awooo~ I'll do it!
I'm coming to help now,
Rokusei, wait for me~!

options.text: Let's finish them off in one go!

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
No need to worry about our footing,
and our combat strength has increased, so I'm very grateful.
Now there's nothing to fear-

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Now, let's send these customers
without tickets back to the sea,
and continue enjoying Hero Festa!

name: Canes & Sterio
text: -Yeah!
Battle Start
